description: The DG1 segment contains patient diagnosis information of various types. For example: Admitting, Current, Primary, Final, etc. Coding methodologies are also defined

1.name: Set Id - Diagnosis
1.description: sequence number that uniquely identifies the individual transaction for adding, deleting, and updating the diagnosis in the patient's record

10.name: Drg Grouper Review Code
10.description: refer to user-defined table 0056 - DRG grouper review code. This code indicates that the grouper results have been reviewed and approved

11.name: Outlier Type
11.description: Refer to user-defined table 0083 - outlier type. The type of outlier that has been paid

12.name: Outlier Days
12.description: number of days that have been approved as an outlier payment

13.name: Outlier Cost
13.description: amount of money that has been approved as a payment

15.name: Diagnosis / Drg Priority
15.description: number which identifies the significance or priority of the diagnosis or DRG code

16.name: Diagnosing Clinician
16.description: individual responsible for generating the diagnosis information

2.name: Diagnosis Coding Method
2.description: ICD9 is the recommended coding methodology. Refer to user-defined table 0053- diagnosis coding method

3.name: Diagnosis Code
3.description: diagnosis code assigned to this diagnosis. Refer to user-defined table 0051- diagnosis code

4.name: Diagnosis Description
4.description: description that best describes the diagnosis

6.name: Diagnosis / Drg Type
6.description: code identifies the type of diagnosis being sent. Valid types could include: Admitting, Final, etc. Refer to user-defined table 0052- diagnosis type

7.name: Major Diagnostic Category
7.description: refer to user-defined table 0118 - major diagnostic category

8.name: Diagnostic Related Group
8.description: DRG for the transaction. Interim DRG's could be determined for an encounter. Refer to user-defined table 0055- DRG code

9.name: Drg Approval Indicator
9.description: indicates if the DRG has been approved by a reviewing entity
